subtasks: Determine the appropriate time to plant peanuts (April and May)
Grow peanuts for about four months
Prepare the soil for planting
Plant the peanut seeds
Care for the growing plants
Monitor for flowering

Identify the peg, a small stem reaching down from the flower to the soil
Monitor the development of the peanut fruit as it grows underground
Harvest peanuts after four months of growth
Timing the harvest after four months of growth
Dig up the peanuts from the soil where the pegs developed
